name: Time Trodden
description:
Time Trodden is a 2D Side-Scroller about saving time.. by BREAKING IT.

Go through various levels in the past, the present, and the future-
Collect items, kill baddies, and solve puzzles, all the while making your way through
Time. It's TIME to save time. Play it now!

Source Code: https://github.com/ryanhlewis/Phaser-Time-Game

Contributors: Alyssa, Angela, Ryan
